about_the_game:
Since 1990, he has been running a game company and expanding its scale, expanding the company's business to various branches of the gaming industry, including game engines, game consoles, and online stores.

In Career Mode, you can choose three different starting points in life, which correspond to the three difficulty levels of the game.
Garage life: The most difficult mode, both in terms of funding and ability, is the lowest. You need to slowly make a fortune by completing contract work in a small garage until you have enough funds to actually develop your first game.
Dream Chaser: Medium difficulty. As a former game industry practitioner, you have accumulated sufficient start-up capital and capabilities. Now it's time to realize your dreams.
Investor's life: The easiest difficulty, you have sufficient funds to build your own game empire from scratch.

No matter which opening you choose, you can experience the most basic process of developing a game in the game. You need to design the game from three aspects: program technology, game design, and content creation.
These three aspects are divided into several specific modules to highly customize the imagined game.

Profit through the release of games, accumulate fans, and make game IP more valuable.

If you have enough funds, you can even develop game engines and game consoles.
If you are tired of high-cost physical game, you can also consider game distribution platforms. Too high a share? Develop your own game distribution platform!
